schema.description: 分页索引，表示要获取第几页的数据，第一页从1开始。
每页大小，允许20、50、100三个选择。

OsVersionList.description: 版本列表信息，包括当前页的版本列表以及总共符合条件的版本个数

Items.description: 符合条件的当前页的版本列表

TotalCount.description: 符合条件的总记录数，方便调用方计算总页数

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064",
  "OsVersionList": {
    "TotalCount": 1000,
    "Items": [
      {
        "GmtCreateTimestamp": 16754300000,
        "Status": "PUBLISHED",
        "DeviceModelId": "123",
        "IsMilestone": "Y",
        "GmtModify": "2018-04-24 12:23:45",
        "Remark": "测试",
        "StatusName": "已发布",
        "SystemVersion": "2.0.1-R-20180506.0824",
        "IsForceReboot": "N",
        "DeviceModelName": "DM1",
        "IsSilentUpgrade": "N",
        "GmtModifyTimestamp": 16754300000,
        "IsForceNightUpgrade": "N",
        "GmtCreate": "2018-04-24 12:23:45",
        "IsForceUpgrade": "N",
        "Id": 12004
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":"{
  "RequestId": "6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064",
  "HostId": "iovcc.cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com",
  "Code": "NoPermissionToAccessProject",
  "Message": "User is not authorized to access the specified project."
}"},{"type":"xml","example":"<FindOsVersionsResponse>
	<OsVersionList>
		<Items>
			<DeviceModelId>100</DeviceModelId>
			<DeviceModelName>DM1</DeviceModelName>
			<GmtCreate>2017-12-06 12:04:08</GmtCreate>
			<GmtModify>2017-12-06 13:04:06</GmtModify>
			<Id>123</Id>
			<IsForceNightUpgrade>Y</IsForceNightUpgrade>
			<IsForceReboot>N</IsForceReboot>
			<IsForceUpgrade>N</IsForceUpgrade>
			<IsMilestone>N</IsMilestone>
			<IsSilentUpgrade>N</IsSilentUpgrade>
			<Remark>测试</Remark>
			<Status>PUBLISHED</Status>
			<StatusName>已发布</StatusName>
			<SystemVersion>2.0.1-R-20180502.1208</SystemVersion>
		</Items>
		<TotalCount>1000</TotalCount>
	</OsVersionList>
	<RequestId>6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064</RequestId>
</FindOsVersionsResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 分页获取系统版本列表
summary: 调用FindOsVersions分页获取系统版本列表。
description: > 此接口支持多种查询条件，如机型、系统版本号等。
